mapper.sql: business_no, order_info, member_id, member_name, member_cellphone, order_sum, create_time, evaluate, pay_type, status, provider_id, provider_name, order_num, produt_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from business_order
order by create_time desc

select * from business_order,member where business_order.member_id=member.id order by business_order.create_time desc
limit ${pageSize},${pageNum}

select business_no, order_info, member_id, member_name, member_cellphone, order_sum, evaluate, pay_type,order_num,business_order.provider_id,business_order.status, business_order.produt_id,provider_produt.price,provider_produt.service_name, provider_produt.provider_name,business_order.create_time,provider_produt.service_info from business_order,provider_produt where business_order.produt_id=provider_produt.id order by status desc

select * from business_order
and business_no like '%${likeName}%' order by create_time
select * from business_order,member where business_order.member_id=member.id and provider_id like '%${providerid}%' and business_order.status=2
select * from business_order,member where business_order.member_id=member.id and provider_id like '%${providerid}%' and business_order.status=1

select * from business_order,member
and order_info like '%${likeName}%' and provider_id like '%${providerid}%' and business_order.status=2 order by business_order.create_time

select * from business_order,member
and order_info like '%${likeName}%' and provider_id like '%${providerid}%' and business_order.status=1 order by business_order.create_time

select * from business_order,member where business_no like '%${likeName}%' and business_order.member_id=member.id order by business_order.create_time
limit ${pageSize},${pageNum}
select * from business_order where TO_DAYS(create_time)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) order by create_time
select * from business_order where YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d'))=YEARWEEK(NOW()) order by create_time
select * from business_order where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m') order by create_time
select sum(order_sum) allSum from business_order where TO_DAYS(create_time)=TO_DAYS(NOW())
select sum(order_sum) allSum from business_order where YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d'))=YEARWEEK(NOW())
select sum(order_sum) allSum from business_order where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')

update business_order
business_no = #{record.businessNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_info = #{record.orderInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_id = #{record.memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

order_info = #{orderInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_cellphone = #{memberCellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_sum = #{orderSum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where business_no = #{businessNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
